1.title: Senior HelpDesk Specialist, Team Lead
1.job_description:
[
3Shape A/S is a Danish hi-tech company specializing in the production and development of 3D solutions (3D scanners and 3D software) for industrial and healthcare applications, such as hearing and dental aid production, where we have a global leading position.Two graduate students founded 3Shape in the year 2000, and today the company’s fast-growing team of 1600+ employees in 20 offices worldwide (Denmark, Germany, Poland, Ukraine, USA etc.) is serving customers in over 100 countries. We are looking for an experiencedSenior HelpDesk Specialist / HelpDesk Team Lead to work in our Kyiv office.Responsibilities:
Management of the local IT HelpDesk Team
Supervision of the local IT HelpDesk queue and taking care of the proper tickets processing according to existing procedures
Continuous improvement of the IT Helpdesk processes together with the global management team.
Local Events coordination
Handling of escalated tickets
Participation in the local and global IT projects
End users support and building of the IT awareness among employees
We require:
People management skills
Leadership
Positive attitude
Work ethic
Working well under pressure
Wide technical knowledge, especially MS Windows systems allowing you to fluently support end users with their daily problems
Basic knowledge in LANs and connectivity issues troubleshooting methods
Knowledge in Active Directory service giving you fluency in managing user accounts and security groups.
English: at least B2 (Common European Framework of Reference)
Min. 5 Years of experience in the IT department
We offer:
Participation in producing market-leading technology products for customers around the world
Work in a unique professional, friendly and supportive environment
Constant professional growth and development
Occasional business trips to Western Europe
Competitive salary level
Good working conditions in a comfortable office (not open space!) near National Technical University «KPI»
39 working hours per week within flexible time-frame from 8:00 till 20:00
Possibility of partially remote work
A parking lot with free spaces for employees
A healthy work-life balance
Annual paid vacation (24 working days)
Paid sick leaves and a child sick leaves
Maternity and paternity leaves
Medical insurance (incl. massage in the office).
English classes with a native speaker
Compensation of lunches
Regular company events
Opportunity to become a part of the success that 3Shape has created over the past 20 years
We will be glad to welcome you in our team!For more information, visit our web-site: www.3shape.com or contact HR department via e-mail [відгукнутися] or by phone 
Показати телефон
]

3.job_description:
[
Требования:
внимательность 
аналитический склад ума 
ответственность 
предпочтение отдается кандидатам со знаниями и опытом в сферах системного и сетевого администрирования, администрирования баз данных, тестирования программного обеспечения.
Условия работы:

высокий уровень оплаты труда
широкие возможности для профессионального роста
стандартный соцпакет
Обязанности:
мониторинг инцидентов
участие в тестировании ПО

]

10.title: Business Customer Support Manager
10.job_description:
[
An international software development product company «TechMedia4U» is looking for a Business Customer Support Manager who helps us to support our product and make it the best.Requirements:
Good command of English: Upper — intermediate level and higher of speaking and writing
Good communication skills
Experience with using CRM systems
Experience with customer support
Experience with task trackers
Basic understanding of web product development
Basic HTML knowledge
Technical education as a plus
Ability to work both individually and within a team
A quick mind
Problem solver and a very responsible person
Responsibilities:
Support of business users (internal) via various communication channels
Assistance to business users with using the system
Providing education and onboarding to users
Collecting own feedback/users experience and passing to the team
Monitoring system’s activity, reacting to any issues or suspicions
Writing manuals
Solving of any technical and organizational issues
We offer:
Working in a successfully dynamic international company
Competitive salary
Paid sick lists and vacations
Medical insurance
English courses
Flexible work schedule
Work with a professional team
Friendly atmosphere
Corporate events
Cozy office in the city center
We would be glad and happy to welcome you to our team and family:)
]

11.title: Оператор технической поддержки
11.job_description:
[
Аутсорсинговая компания «КонсалингЮА». Мы предоставляем услуги разного профиля для обслуживания сайтов. Компания всегда готова принять к себе в команду молодого, целеустремленного, готового к обучению сотрудника. Отсутствие опыта нас нисколько не пугает, мы самостоятельно обучаем новых сотрудников и даем возможность приобрести опыт работы в разных сферах деятельности.Обязанности:
Предоставлять поддержку клиентам в режиме онлайн.
Работа с базой данных.
Обработка писем на почте.
Требования:
Уверенный пользователь ПК.
Грамотная письменная речь.
Внимательность, ответственность, обучаемость, стрессоустойчивость. 
Условия работы:
График работы: сменный (день/ночь, 2 дня дома).
Стабильная заработная плата.
Работа в офисе г. Киев
Комфортные условия труда.
Печерский район, ст.м. Дворец спорта.
]
